page.title: 18N.I.A.E. Present Day
page.content:
Divisions continued
Instrumentation & Control and Overseas Divisions. Other groups specialise in operational research, control engineering, ergonomics and machine reliability. An information Services Dept. including graphics, photography and scientific information has been established. Funding is derived from the Dept. of Ed.& Science,the Ministry of Ag. Fisheries and Food, the Overseas Devel.Admin, the Dept of Trade & Industry and other publicly funded bodies. WORK OF THE INSTITUTE
Research results are put to good use and papers are published in academic journals such as the Journal of Agricultural Engineering Research, exhibits are mounted at agricultural
